text: Guzmania rubrolutea is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.Manzanares, J.M. & Pitman, N. 2003. Guzmania rubrolutea. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
